exercise.title: This is the title: Exercise 1
exercise.sentence:
Saudi Arabia and Dubai are in the
Centre East. Far East. Middle East.

Nicaragua is in
North America. Middle America. Latin America.

China is in the
Far East. Middle East. Pacific East.

Australia, Japan, and Korea are all in the
Asia area. Asia-Pacific area. Atlantic area.

Products arrive at a company's _____ and then they deliver them to customers.
technical centre sales office distribution centre

A company's _____ is where all the important managers work.
head office factory technical centre

A company's _____ is a special place for research and development.
sales office technical centre distribution centre

We make _____ products like shampoo and soap.
buyer client consumer

Reebok and Nike are both _____ brands.
world-strong world-known world-class

Does your office have good transport connections?
Yes. There are an airport very near us. Yes. There's an airport very near us. Yes. There have an airport very near us.

_____ international flights from this airport.
There aren't any There not any They're not any

I'm in the technical centre in the USA next month. Is there a good hotel near the office?
Yes, there. Yes, there is. Yes, there are.

Are there buses from the airport?
No, there aren't. No, there not. No, there are any.

Is there _____ canteen in the office?
a any some

I need _____ help.
a some any

There are _____ outside the hotel.
any taxis some taxi some taxis

There _____ shops in the airport.
aren't any isn't some aren't no

_____ I speak to Mr Zimmerman please?
Do Could Would

Can I have
contact number? any contact number? a contact number?

Could I _____ a message for Tina?
speak make leave

Can she call me back as soon
as possible? like possible? than possible?

I'm sorry Mr Jones isn't here
morning. this morning. in morning.

My name is James Moat.
Moat? Is that M to be Mother? Moat? Is that M as in Mother? Moat? Is that M of Mother?

Please ask Julian to call me back this afternoon.
OK, I give him your message. OK, I'd give him your message. OK, I'll give him your message.
